General.Name: Birman Wood and Hardware Ltd
General.Description: Birman Wood & Hardware Ltd imports, produces, and markets wood panels, hardware products, kitchen electrical appliances, and laminate flooring parquets. The company offers wood products, such as plywood, MDF, chipboard, hardboard, flexboard, pine edge glued panel, panel for construction and decoration, solid lumber, and light weight panel products, as well as designs various products with special overlays. It also imports and markets professional and decorative hardware products for furniture branches. The company imports, fabricates, and installs products made of solid surface, such as kitchen tops, bathrooms, and sinks and projects in the healthcare, food, and offices sectors; and supplies kitchen electric appliances, such as refrigerators, ovens, hobs, cooker hoods, coffee machines, and dishwashers under the Fulgor Milano, Bellini, and Best brands. It operates in Israel, the Palestinian Authority, and Gaza. Birman Wood & Hardware Ltd was founded in 1932 and is headquartered in Tiberias, Israel.
General.Address: Kedmat Galil Industrial Zone, Tiberias, Israel, 14100
